DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the observational study was to supplement the data on efficacy, safety and tolerability of telmisartan under daily conditions in hospitals
DOC.brief_title: Observation of Therapy With MicardisÂ® (Telmisartan) in Patients With Essential Hypertension in Hospitals
DOC.criteria: Patients with diagnosis of essential hypertension Minimum age of 18 years
